record.field: This form is intended to help the responsible of a recruitment interview.
Should show the technical abilities of the person in terms of the job the candidate is taken into.
Should show the knowledge of the person in the area of her / his job activities.
Should show the effectiveness and clarity of the exchange of information.
Should show the state of mind or a feeling about work and organisation.
Should show the collective pattern of behaviour, character, temperamental, emotional and mental traits of the person.
Should show the ability to make decisions; involves others as appropriate; demonstrates ability to resolve issues.
Should show the ability to adapt with the new work environment and the changed circumstances effectively.
Should show the goal or ambition of the person after a particular period.

Coding Style (Indenting, Formatting, Comment for a block of Code, Variable declaration and it's Clarity)
Naming convention (Project File, Source File, Namespace, Class,Struct or Interface, Method, Property, Variable and Parameters)
Language Usage (Variable and Types, Flow Control, Events, Delegates, and Threading)
Programming Features(Latest keywords, syntax, classes and objects)
Effective use of Client Side Scripting language
DB Object Usage (Store procedure, Functions, Triggers, Constraints, Keys and views)
Clarity of Code(Variable declaration, Commenting of Code for Store Procedure, Function, Trigger, Cursor or View)
Time taken to complete the task
